name: Maynlex
description:
You are a lone soldier on an infested island. You are a soldier on a lonely island. You're the only person living on the island. The island is not special. You are not special. You are alone.

These Are the End Times

Maynlex is a First Person Open World Adventure/Survival Indie Horror game by PatchNoteStudio. This Game was made by Marco Sadowski in 7 Days

The game is a prototype!

patchnotestudio.com
